v1.about:
I build LinkedIn-centric brand systems that turn attention into booked calls.

Your profile isn’t a bio. It’s a due-diligence filter. I standardize the signals buyers scan first: clarity, authority, relevance, proof.

What I do
- Banner system with message ladder and authority variants
- Headline, About, and Featured that pass the 5-second test
- Content design system for insights, cases, teardowns, and offers
- Color, type, and spacing tokens so every asset is unmistakably you

Why it works
People skim. Algorithms skim. Consistency lowers cognitive load, speeds understanding, and reduces perceived risk. Inconsistent cues reset recognition to zero. I fix that.

Outcomes
Faster recognition in feed and profile views
Higher reply and booked-call rates
Shorter sales cycles and stronger price power

Who I help
Creators and founders who sell through content: advisors, operators, recruiters, B2B consultants.

How we ship
48-hour Sprint for a converting profile fast.
System builds when you want a repeatable content engine.

Design is not decoration. Design is signal. Signals cut uncertainty. Uncertainty kills deals.

If you want LinkedIn to feel like a pipeline, not a poster, let’s align your signals and go to market.
v1.headline: I Craft & Design brands For Content-Led Brand Owners
